Citation

Source: inst/CITATION

Sachs M, Gabriel E, Sjölander A, Jonzon G (2025). causaloptim: An Interface to Specify Causal Graphs and Compute Bounds on Causal Effects. R package version 1.0.1, https://sachsmc.github.io/causaloptim/.
